main event: An unidentified flying object was observed at Santa Maria Airport in the Azores on 21 September 1954.
interesting points: The object was reported to be light metallic blue and approximately 10 feet in length or height., A blond-haired man, about 5'10", exited the object and attempted to converse with the witness but failed., The observation lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes., Control tower personnel and military pilots also witnessed similar unidentified flying objects in the area., The incident was classified as unidentified based on a second-hand report.
